type.name: org.gradle.nativeplatform.NativeDependencySet
type.description: * Models a collection of native type dependencies.

method.name: getIncludeRoots
method.description: * Returns the header file directories to use at compile time.

method.name: getLinkFiles
method.description: * Returns the files to use at link time.

method.name: getRuntimeFiles
method.description: * Returns the files to use at runtime.

property.name: includeRoots
property.description: * Returns the header file directories to use at compile time.

property.name: linkFiles
property.description: * Returns the files to use at link time.

property.name: runtimeFiles
property.description: * Returns the files to use at runtime.
